name: The Game Ends When You Get 19 Acorns
name_original: The Game Ends When You Get 19 Acorns
description:
Game a week 6!

The Game Ends When You Get 19 Acorns is a ~5-minute platformer.

There's not much to it. I did a lot of backend work, so the actually gameplay isn't much this week.

Next week the seeds will actually go in the ground!

CONTROLS

Z - Interact/Confirm

X - Cancel/Jump

C - Menu/Swap party member position

Arrow Keys - Move
